steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Navigate to the 'Review' tab in the Word ribbon.
Click on the 'Compare' button in the 'Compare' group.
Select the 'Compare Two Documents' option from the drop-down menu.
In the 'Original document' field, browse and select the first document to compare.
In the 'Revised document' field, browse and select the second document to compare.
Click on the 'OK' button to start the document comparison process.
Review the comparison results and make any necessary changes or accept/reject the proposed changes.
Save the compared document with a new name or overwrite the original document if desired.
